sect2.title: Getting files
sect2.para: Latest releases can be always downloaded from WinMerge homepage: http://www.winmerge.org/. Note that there may be some delay updating homepages for releases, but project statuspage at http://sourceforge.net/projects/winmerge/shows latest files. There is also mailing-list for release announcements. Stable releases are also available in several file download sites.

sect2.title: Running install program
sect2.para: Install program asks location where WinMerge is installed, installs files, configures shell integration and adds WinMerge to start-menu.

sect2.title: Shell integration
sect2.para: If install program is not used, shell integration dll (ShellExtension.dll) must be registered separately. This is done by running register.bat from WinMerge directory.
